EmailTemplate.name: Reconnecting about VMTurbo (now Turbonomic) (1495474564.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Reconnecting about VMTurbo (now Turbonomic) (1495474564.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Ubaldo, Hope everything is going well with you. Back in 2014 you and the team at iTopia were customers of Turbonomic (then VMTurbo) and I wanted to see if you might have some time in May or June to review the platform again to see what is new with Turbonomic. With a new update every quarter, there have been quite a few changes on our side including the rebrand to Turbonomic but our general mission is still the same: Turbnonomic’s control platform increases application performance on less infrastructure. Do you have time over the next couple of months to do a 30 minutes review of what is new? Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
